mapper.select:
select C.CRT_ID, CRT_DETA_ID, D.OPT_DETA_ID, ME_ID, C.PRDT_ID, CNT, PRDT_NM, PRDT_PRC, SALE_ST, OPT_DETA_NM, ADD_PRC, OPT_ID , PRDT_IMG
from CART_DETAIL D right OUTER JOIN CART C ON C.CRT_ID=D.CRT_ID LEFT JOIN PRODUCT P ON C.PRDT_ID = P.PRDT_ID LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_OPTION_DETAIL OD ON D.OPT_DETA_ID = OD.OPT_DETA_ID LEFT JOIN (select PRDT_IMG,PRDT_ID from PRODUCT_IMG WHERE IS_MAIN='Y') I ON P.PRDT_ID = I.PRDT_ID
where me_id=#{meId} ORDER BY CRT_ID
mapper.update: update cart set cnt=#{cnt} where crt_id=#{crtId}
mapper.insert:
select 'ORD'||ORDER_SEQ.NEXTVAL from DUAL
insert into ORDER_HEADER (ORDR_ID, ME_ID, RCV_PSN, RCV_PHONE, RCV_ADDR, TT_PRC, MTHD, SHIP_PRC, PRC_ST, SHIP_ST, POINT, NOTE, IMP) VALUES( #{newId}, #{meId}, #{rcvPsn}, #{rcvPhone}, #{rcvAddr}, #{ttPrc}, #{mthd}, #{shipPrc}, #{prcSt}, #{shipSt}, #{point}, #{note}, #{imp} )
